metadata.title: CVE-2024-53049 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:slub/kunit: fix a WARNING due to unwrapped __kmalloc_cache_noprof'modprobe slub_kunit' will have a warning as shown below. The root causeis that __kmalloc_cache_noprof was directly used, which resulted in noalloc_tag being allocated. This caused current->alloc_tag to be null,leading to a warning in alloc_tag_add_check.Let's add an alloc_hook layer to __kmalloc_cache_noprof specificallywithin lib/slub_kunit.c, which is the only user of this internal slubfunction outside kmalloc implementation itself.[58162.947016] WARNING: CPU: 2 PID: 6210 at./include/linux/alloc_tag.h:125 alloc_tagging_slab_alloc_hook+0x268/0x27c[58162.957721] Call trace:[58162.957919]  alloc_tagging_slab_alloc_hook+0x268/0x27c[58162.958286]  __kmalloc_cache_noprof+0x14c/0x344[58162.958615]  test_kmalloc_redzone_access+0x50/0x10c [slub_kunit][58162.959045]  kunit_try_run_case+0x74/0x184 [kunit][58162.959401]  kunit_generic_run_threadfn_adapter+0x2c/0x4c [kunit][58162.959841]  kthread+0x10c/0x118[58162.960093]  ret_from_fork+0x10/0x20[58162.960363] ---[ end trace 0000000000000000 ]---

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-53049` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.5.0-9.9.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-9.9.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required
